about_the_game:
A life full of adventures and incredible experiences keeps our cauldron of emotions always bubbling.

With this goal in mind, B4T Games brings you its new pack of incredibly Epic Roller Coasters, the Fantasy Thrills Bundle.

This brand-new pack contains four new rides that will send you on tracks that run through classic tales of literature, magical places from our childhood, and in the middle of the battle between a superheroine and her archenemy.

The bundle includes:

- 4 Roller Coaster maps: Lady Tuff Adventure, Epic Dreamland, The Red Hood Girl, Elves' Workshop of Wonders

- 4 Roller Coaster carts

Epic Roller Coasters is where you will find the most unique roller coasters of the world. Feel the adrenaline of fast speed, loops and heights in places that you could never imagine riding a roller coaster before, such as dinosaur age, medieval age, sci-fi city and a lot more. Try it out on three different modes: classic, shooter and race.
